forum.content: I forget the last time I fell in love, many came to express love to me but none of them made my heart tremble even today, often I ask them why they like me just because of the outward appearance.What I want is someone who really likes me not only because of the way but all about himself that can make me comfortable and feel happy when with him.Because I am a good woman I never think about dating or anything else I do is keep and protect myself until there is a man who came to propose me and deserve to have me not for a moment but forever. My dream is to be a proud child for my parents So a good brother for my younger brother, so a loyal wife for my husband and mother who loves my son.My prayers to god guard them when I am far away and grant my dreams when I am able to receive them. Amen
forum.title: All about me
